page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: Father Cyril Barlow is the priest at St. John Fisher Catholic Church in Cofton Rd. The church was built between 1963-1965 and cost 97,000 pounds. It serves a parish of about 6500 people. Three services are held on a Sunday, two on Saturday and are on every weekday. A shared service is held with St. Annes, John the baptist and Longbridge Baptist churches once a week. Within the next year the church hopes to build a parish centre to used by various groups in the commuity. The Rev. Nick Bralesford is the vicar at Wyhall Lane. There is no church building for this part of the block so services are held all around the area. Sunday services are held at the hall on the Fairway. Rev.Bralesford moved to Kings Norton in spring 1985 after spring as a curate in Shelfield and Leicester.
